Key Match Events: The Boston Celtics dominated from start to finish against the Atlanta Hawks, improving their record to 7-1.
Jayson Tatum carried the Celtics with a stellar performance, scoring 28 points on 10-for-21 shooting.
Boston overwhelmed Atlanta in transition, outscoring the Hawks 35-4 in fast-break points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: At 7-1, the Celtics are off to their best start since the 2019-20 season.
Atlanta ranks 28th in defensive rating, and the Celtics exploited every hole in their defense.
